variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| summarize collectDistinct(cloud.provider)

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields audit.result

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields audit.identity

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fieldsKeep client.ip

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields browser.name

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields device.os.name

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields actor.geo.country.name

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields actor.geo.city.name

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields object.name

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields result.code

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| fields client.app.name

0.title: Last 50 sign-in attempts
0.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| sort timestamp desc
| fields Time=audit.time, `Result message`=result.message, `Result code`=result.code, `Target service`=object.name,
         User=audit.identity, `Client application`=client.app.name, Browser=browser.name, 
         `Client IP`=client.ip, City=actor.geo.city.name
| sort Time desc
| limit 50

3.title: Sign-in activity oucomes over time
3.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries {
  Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded", default:0),
  Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded", default:0)
}, time:audit.time

17.title: Successful sign-in rate
17.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize tot = count(), success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded")
| fields rate = round(toDouble(success)/toDouble(tot) * 100, decimals:2)

18.title: Failed sign-in rate
18.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize tot = count(), failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded")
| fields rate = round(toDouble(failure)/toDouble(tot) * 100, decimals:2)

22.title: Top 10 sign-in devices
22.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{Browser=browser.name, OS=device.os.name}
| sort Success+Failure desc
| limit 10

25.content:
## Top sign-in activity breakdown
This section provides a breakdown of the top 10 locations, target services, client applications, devices, and users with sign-in activity.

36.title: Top 10 users by failed sign-in attempts
36.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {Failures = count(), `Client applications` = collectDistinct(client.app.name), `IPs` = collectDistinct(client.ip)}, by:{User=audit.identity}
| sort Failures desc
| limit 10

45.title: Top 10 IP addresses by failed sign-in attempts
45.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {Failures = count(), Users = collectDistinct(audit.identity), 
            `Target services` = collectDistinct(client.app.name)}, by:{`Client IP`=client.ip, City=actor.geo.city.name}
| sort Failures desc
| limit 10

50.title: Multi-factor authentication rate
50.description: Percentage of sign-in attempts using multi-factor authentication mechanisms.
50.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {tot = count(), mfaCount = countIf(authentication.is_multifactor == true)}
| fields rate = round(toDouble(mfaCount)/toDouble(tot) * 100, decimals:2)

52.title: Sign-in error list by number of failed attempts

54.content:
# Sign-in activity monitoring

This dashboard is designed to provide a comprehensive overview of user sign-in activities within your cloud environments.

61.title: Total sign-in attempts by country
61.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize count = count(), 
  by:{actor.geo.city.name, actor.geo.country.name, 
      actor.geo.location.lon, actor.geo.location.lat}

63.title: Top 10 client applications
63.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{Application=client.app.name}
| sort Success+Failure desc
| limit 10

67.title: Top 10 sign-in locations
67.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{City=actor.geo.city.name, Country=actor.geo.country.name}
| sort Success+Failure desc
| limit 10

68.title: Top 10 target services
68.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{`Target Service`=object.name}

69.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{User=audit.identity}

70.title: Failed sign-in attempts by target service over time
70.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries count(default:0), by:{`Target Service`=object.name}, time:audit.time

71.title: Top 10 sign-in IPs
71.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize { Success = countIf(audit.result=="Succeeded"), Failure = countIf(audit.result!="Succeeded") }, by:{IP=client.ip}
| sort Success+Failure desc
| limit 10

72.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries count(default:0), by:{City=actor.geo.city.name, Country=actor.geo.country.name}, time:audit.time

73.title: Failed sign-in attempts by client application over time
73.query:

| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries count(default:0), by:{`Client application`=client.app.name}, time:audit.time

74.title: Top 10 devices by failed sign-in attempts
74.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter audit.result!="Succeeded"
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {Failures = count(), `Client applications` = collectDistinct(client.app.name), `IPs` = collectDistinct(client.ip)}, by:{Browser=browser.name, OS=device.os.name}
| sort Failures desc

75.title: Top 10 users performing single-factor authentication
75.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter authentication.is_multifactor == false
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {count=count()}, by:{User=audit.identity}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

76.title: Single-factor authentication attempts by user over time
76.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter authentication.is_multifactor == false
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries count(default:0), by:{User=audit.identity}, time:audit.time

78.title: Single-factor authentication attempts by target service over time
78.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter authentication.is_multifactor == false
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| makeTimeseries count(default:0), by:{`Target Service`=object.name}, time:audit.time

79.title: Top 10 target services with single-factor authentication
79.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter authentication.is_multifactor == false
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| summarize {count=count()}, by:{`Target Service`=object.name}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

81.title: Total sign-in actions
81.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(audit.action) and isNotNull(authentication.is_multifactor)
| filter in(cloud.provider, array($Product)) and in(audit.result, array($Status)) and in(toString(result.code), array($Result_Code)) and in(actor.geo.country.name, array($Country)) and in(actor.geo.city.name, array($City)) and in(device.os.name, array($Device_OS)) and in(browser.name, array($Browser)) and in(client.app.name, array($Client_Application)) and in(audit.identity, array($User)) and in(client.ip, array($User_Ip_Address)) and in(object.name, array($Target_Service))
| fieldsAdd status= if(audit.result=="Succeeded", "Success", else: "Failure")
| summarize count(), by:{status}
